function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global economy predicted to shrink by 6% in 2020 with 300 million job losses","Impact":"Severe economic downturn, increased poverty, and financial instability","Mitigation":"Implement targeted economic stimulus packages, job creation initiatives, and social safety nets","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools, digital financial platforms for stimulus distribution","People":"Global workforce, particularly those in vulnerable employment sectors","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Significant variance in economic impacts across sectors and countries","Impact":"Unequal distribution of economic hardship, potential for social unrest and inequality","Mitigation":"Implement policies for equitable recovery, support for affected industries, and international cooperation","Technologies":"Data analytics for impact assessment, policy modeling and simulation tools","People":"Workers, business owners, and communities in sectors and countries disproportionately affected","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, industry associations"},{"Description":"Reduction in global CO2 emissions due to pandemic-related changes in social practices and energy use","Impact":"Temporary reduction in emissions, potential rebound post-pandemic","Mitigation":"Invest in sustainable energy infrastructure, promote green technology adoption, and enforce emissions regulations","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, carbon capture and storage technology, emissions monitoring and enforcement tools","People":"Global population, especially those vulnerable to climate change impacts","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations, energy industry"}]}
